name: x402-template
description: Next.js Solana starter with X402 payment protocol integration

scripts.clean:telemetry: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const target=path.join(__dirname,'apps','agent-runner','logs','agent-telemetry.jsonl');if(fs.existsSync(target)){fs.rmSync(target);console.log('Telemetry log removed.');}else{console.log('No telemetry log to remove.');}"
scripts.demo: pnpm exec concurrently -k -n facilitator,seller,agent-runner,frontend -c blue,magenta,green,cyan 'pnpm --filter facilitator start' 'pnpm --filter seller-service start' 'pnpm --filter agent-runner start' 'pnpm start' && ./examples/agent-to-agent-demo/scripts/run-demo.sh
